name: Yifu Strip Poker Ver001 18+
description:
This is a fun little strip poker game that I made as a prototype for my upcoming series of strip poker games. I made this so I could learn how to structure and code my future Strip Poker Games and I didn't want to just throw it away so I posted it. There are two animations that play if you make it to the end of the game.

I tested it and it seems to work (on windows anyways) I am hoping that some people will play it and give me some feedback on it so my next game will be better.

Please let me know if you have any problems with this game. I would like some suggestions on how to make it better.

This game contains adult material and sexual content. You must be 18 years old or older to view or play this game.
